subject: Boxing
Life-Sustaining Support Systems, Withdrawal Of
Murders and Attempted Murders
lead_paragraph: The mother of the former champion Hector Camacho, known as Macho Camacho, said she planned to have him taken off life support Saturday, after three more of his sons arrive in Puerto Rico to be with him.
snippet: The mother of the former champion Hector Camacho, known as Macho Camacho, said she planned to have him taken off life support Saturday, after three more of his sons arrive in Puerto Rico to be with him.
